channel.title: matching function on MREF
channel.description: Recent content in matching function on MREF

item.title: Unemployment
item.description: This course presents a matching model of unemployment and uses it to study unemployment fluctuations, efficient unemployment, and labor market policies.

item.title: Economic Slack
item.description: This graduate course presents matching models of economic slack and uses them to study business-cycle fluctuations, monetary policy, and fiscal policy.
